topic.title: Zeroupload
topic.body: Was having trouble using Zeroupload, is it working for anyone else?

1523535578_1KCSzbnNyT3NWB9DZZZ2iMuk9dCz6.body:
For me, I go to zeroupload, click to sign in, and nothing happens.
I attempt to hit the upload button an similarly, simply nothing happens.

I understand Zeroupload requires JS running, which I've allowed.
Have tried from two different browsers, a customized Firefox
and a more straight forward Chromium (which only has a disconnect and ublock origin plugin running)
same results occur with both.
